Reference:
Kaplan MR, Licht KJ, Winckler G, Schaefer JM, Bader N, Mathieson C, Roberts M, Kassab CM, Schwartz R, Graly JA, 2017. Middle to late Pleistocene stability of the central East Antarctic ice sheet at the head of Law Glacier. Geology 45, 963-966.

Data comments:
The "F-90-" samples are originally published in Hagen (1995: PhD thesis, Ohio State University).
Latitudes and longitudes for "F-90-" samples based on Figure 2.
Sample density assumed to be 2.65 g/cm3.
Sampling year based on sample names.
Group ID based on sample location and geomorphology.

expage.github.io - data from expage-202306
